mechanics.trigger: A willing creature is touched by the caster
mechanics.condition: The Spider Climb spell is active on the creature
mechanics.outcome: The creature gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free

mechanics.trigger: A willing creature is touched by the caster
mechanics.condition: The Spider Climb spell is active on the creature
mechanics.outcome: The creature gains a climbing speed equal to its walking speed

description_text: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. The target also gains a climbing speed equal to its walking speed.
